ingredients.ingredient: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix

cookingTips: Cut potatoes uniformly for even roasting
Toss frequently during roasting to ensure even browning and crisping
Serve immediately while potatoes are still warm and crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How confident are you with roasting vegetables? Would you like guidance on achieving crispy exteriors and tender interiors?
